description: An AI Application that uses personalization & budgeting (cost tracking) feature introduced in RAPID v2.3.8 & v2.4.0.

memoryConfig.extractionPrompt: Glean and extract pertinent information or facts about the user from the 'Query'. Limit the facts to one or two. Infer information such as user's topics of interest especially in sports and associated events, game schedules, historical statistics for games played and top players in those events, demographics (where the games/tournaments were played) & any other useful contextual signals. Keep inferences **reasonable and grounded**, not speculative.

Glean and extract pertinent information or facts about the user from the 'Query'. Limit the facts to one or two. Infer information about the user's topics of interest especially in cloud computing, technologies associated with artificial intelligence and machine learning, generative AI, large language models & any other useful contextual signals. Keep inferences **reasonable and grounded**, not speculative.
